About the Company: WS Industries (India) Ltd. Is engaged in the manufacture of high voltage electro-porcelain transmission and sub-station insulators for the electrical transmission and distribution sector.The product range of the company includes Suspension Insulators,Pin insulators,Solidcore Insulators and Hollow Insulators..The company also in the business segment of Electroporcelain, Turnkey Projects.
